input.sentences: [female] and [male] walked toward the beach to get married .
they kissed for the cameras before they took their vows .
[male] 's niece was skeptical of this type of casual wedding .
but [female] 's dad was totally on board .
at the reception people had fun | and even the dog was invited .
output.sentences: The newly married female and male walked in an embrace happy for a beautiful day.
They had said their vows and kissed and now is was time to pose on the beach for the cameras.
Being a blended type of family many of thier family and friends were skeptical of the wedding.
Totally united now the dad had a new female his daughter could call mom.
Though many didn't agree with their marriage most of the people they invited showed up for the reception.
